posts.post_title: FS: Dan Moeller with F stamp (F Scott Fitzgerald?) SOLD
posts.post_content:
So I've been thinking of selling him and the time has come.

Card is really nice regardless of stamp.  Asking $SOLD and will entertain offers. PP friends/family please.  Will consider trades for EPDGs I need......

Really cool card.
